summary: Jar visibility work appears to be implemented by aligning AnimatedJar DOM class names with existing CSS jar selectors and adding/using z-index styling to keep the jar above backgrounds. However, the diff also modifies an explicitly immutable file path and adds an unrelated project_state.json file.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified an explicitly immutable hook file (Internet Identity hook), which was constrained to remain unchanged.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints explicitly forbid modifying frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts (and related immutable paths). The diff shows this file as modified.
BuildRequest did not request adding project state/metadata files; this appears unrelated to jar visibility/styling requirements.
